turn.0: ELI5 : When you get cold what stops our body from just heating itself up like when we are sick?
turn.1: Have you been gaining weight or suffering from low energy?
turn.2: I have been having this problem recently. And I haven't been gaining weight, but now energy yes. I will say I am on the larger side though.
turn.3: Have you had your thyroid checked?   https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/underactive-thyroid-hypothyroidism/
turn.4: I have not, but I can say it runs in my family.
turn.5: Might be worth getting it checked. It's just a simple blood test and then if its underactive it's easily managed with medication.
